data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.

  • You Spend: @LOSS[2 ip]

  • Target Suffers: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.aI4tsuVswH5gfGab]{Air Weakness}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.MRNCMGIcZStGVV9J]{Bolt Weakness}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.zFQpa3KcSAmBCWdE]{Dark Weakness}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.YpXM5ClzMzIcwCgd]{Earth Weakness}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.dAFACJSQzCbcU9We]{Fire Weakness}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.BVOW692emrw4yxR0]{Ice Weakness}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.aPBdnNy1hA8aRctl]{Light Weakness}, or @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.2sXIFIXiWxRHt8CP]{Poison Weakness}

effects.name: Symbol of Weakness
effects.description: When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.
